duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure the maintenance of all facets of physical buildings and grounds in accordance with health and safety requirements.
Define and prioritize major and minor repairs, reviews and approves specifications, and completes all capital/project documentation.
Develop and implement a preventive maintenance program.
Perform on-call service and respond promptly to emergencies.
Daily travel to facilities is regularly required.

education_certification.credential: Associate's Degree with 2-3 years of management/supervisory experience, or High School Diploma/Equivalent with 4-5 years of management/supervisory experience
